meta.name: description
meta.content: Riverside School District 96 serves students and is located in Riverside, IL.

header.h2: GOVERNOR PRITZKER ANNOUNCES MANDATORY SUSPENSION OF IN-PERSON INSTRUCTION EXTENDED TO END OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR

div.p:
Remote Learning Days will continue through the end
of the school year.

div.div: All schools in Riverside School District 96 will remain closed for student attendance through the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

article.aria-label: GOVERNOR PRITZKER ANNOUNCES MANDATORY SUSPENSION OF IN-PERSON INSTRUCTION EXTENDED TO END OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR

h3.a: GOVERNOR PRITZKER ANNOUNCES MANDATORY SUSPENSION OF IN-PERSON INSTRUCTION EXTENDED TO END OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR

div.div: Remote Learning Days will continue through the end of the school year.

img.alt: GOVERNOR PRITZKER ANNOUNCES MANDATORY SUSPENSION OF IN-PERSON INSTRUCTION EXTENDED TO END OF THE 2019-20 SCHOOL YEAR Featured Photo

article.aria-label: Remote Learning Update - April 17

h3.a: Remote Learning Update - April 17

div.div: By now I am sure most of you have heard the updated information from Governor Pritzker requiring all Illinois schools to be closed for the remainder of this school year.

img.alt: Remote Learning Update - April 17 Featured Photo

article.aria-label: Local Food Pantry Information

h3.a: Local Food Pantry Information

div.div: Please click on this News item to access full details regarding how, when and where to access local area Food Pantries

article.aria-label: District 96 Remote Learning Update

h3.a: District 96 Remote Learning Update

div.div: Today, Illinois Governor J.B. Pritzker announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through April 30 in order to slow down the spread of COVID-19. Remote learning will continue for all District 96 students through April 30 and possibly longer.

img.alt: District 96 Remote Learning Update Featured Photo

article.aria-label: District 96 Update: March 30

h3.a: District 96 Update: March 30

div.div: I would like to share a few new updates as we welcome you back to another week of remote learning in District 96.

article.aria-label: THIS MONTH! Be Counted in the 2020 Census!

h3.a: THIS MONTH! Be Counted in the 2020 Census!

div.div: A Census Message for D96 Parents from Cristin Evans (Riverside Village Trustee)

article.aria-label: District 96 Update - March 20, 2020

h3.a: District 96 Update - March 20, 2020

div.div: We wanted to check in with you at the end of your first week of eLearning with your children. You might be relieved to know that next week is Spring Break!

article.aria-label: ALL D96 FACILITIES CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

h3.a: ALL D96 FACILITIES CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

div.div: Registration, student resource pick-up/drop-off and deliveries by appointment only.

img.alt: ALL D96 FACILITIES CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE Featured Photo

article.aria-label: Effective Monday, March 16 All Schools in Riverside School District 96 will be Closed for Student Attendance. eLearning will start Wednesday, March 18!

h3.a: Effective Monday, March 16 All Schools in Riverside School District 96 will be Closed for Student Attendance. eLearning will start Wednesday, March 18!

img.alt: Effective Monday, March 16 All Schools in Riverside School District 96 will be Closed for Student Attendance. eLearning will start Wednesday, March 18! Featured Photo

article.aria-label: Coronavirus (COVID-19): Updates and Resources from District 96

h3.a: Coronavirus (COVID-19): Updates and Resources from District 96

div.div: In response to the growing concern about the potential spread and impact of the COVID-19 (Coronavirus), we want to reassure you that the district is closely monitoring the news and updates from the Illinois Department of Health (IDPH) and the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

img.alt: Coronavirus (COVID-19): Updates and Resources from District 96 Featured Photo

h3.a: District 96 Kindergarten Registration Night for the 2020-21 School Year

div.div: This event will take place on the evening of Thursday, March 5th
